name: Boxed In (itch) (Matt Young)
description:
BOXED IN

Everywhere you park in this city, something crazy is happening when you're ready to leave. You just keep Running Out Of Space while you're trying to drive out of your parking space.

I had a lot of fun making this and I hope you like it!

Controls

WASD - Drive and Steer the car.

Mouse - Move the camera around.

Esc - Display Pause Menu.

Sneaky Cheats:
If you're really struggling you can toggle collision with Ctrl + Shift + P

Credits Playtesting

Vatyx (https://vatyx.itch.io/)

3D Assets

Polygon - City Pack by Synty Studios (https://unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/polygon-city-pack)
